<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->


<P><FONT SIZE=2>Lessee
shall furnish to Lessor certificates evidencing such insurance. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XX  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> QUIET ENJOYMENT  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessor agrees that on payment of the rentals, fees and charges as herein provided and performance of the covenants and agreements on the part of Lessee to be
performed hereunder, Lessee shall peaceably have and enjoy the leased premises and all the rights and privileges of the Airport, its appurtenances and facilities granted herein. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXI  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> TITLE TO EQUIPMENT, IMPROVEMENTS<BR>
AND FACILITIES ERECTED BY LESSEE  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It is agreed that title to any equipment, improvements, and facilities, and any additions thereto, irrespective of whether the same would otherwise become a
fixture under Michigan law (including without limitation all buildings, hangars, structures, storage tanks, pipes, pumps, wires, poles, machinery and air-conditioning equipment),
constructed or installed by Lessee upon the premises leased hereunder to Lessee for its exclusive or preferential use or upon other Airport property (other than equipment, improvements and facilities
financed by Lessor, whether with the proceeds of Bonds, PFCs, Federal funds or otherwise), shall remain the property of Lessee, unless it has at any time during the term of this Agreement by written
notice and election, vested title to all or any part thereof in Lessor. Lessee shall have the right at any time during the term of this agreement, or any renewal or extension hereof, to remove any or
all of such equipment, improvements and facilities, provided Lessee is not at any such time in default in its payments to Lessor hereunder and subject further to Lessee's obligation to repair all
damage, if any, reasonable wear and tear excepted, resulting from such removal. If at any time during this Agreement, Lessee has exercised its right to vest title to such equipment, improvements and
facilities in Lessor, it shall no longer have the right to remove such property. Lessee agrees to remove said equipment, improvements and facilities at the expiration or other termination of this
Agreement irrespective of whether it has exercised its right of election to vest title to the same in </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>27</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=4,SEQ=31,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=764766,FOLIO='27',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DM1224B.;7',USER='AGAETZ',CD='19-MAR-2003;11:18' -->
<A NAME="page_dm1224_1_28"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Lessor, if so requested by Lessor, and, upon failure so to do, Lessor shall have the right to remove the same and charge to Lessee the actual cost of such removal and restoration of the site to its
original condition, ordinary wear and tear excepted. Any such equipment, improvements or facilities not removed by Lessee prior to the expiration or other termination of this Agreement shall thereupon
become the property of Lessor. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXII  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> SURRENDER OF POSSESSION  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the expiration or earlier termination of this Agreement or any renewal hereof, Lessee shall forthwith surrender possession of the premises in as good
condition as when received, reasonable wear and tear, damage by flood, fire, earthquake, other casualty, Acts of God or the public enemy, excepted. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXIII  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> MINERAL RIGHTS  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It is agreed and understood that all water, gas, oil and mineral rights in and under the soil are expressly reserved to Lessor. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXIV  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> CONDEMNATION  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the acquisition by condemnation or the exercise of the power of eminent domain under any Federal or state statute by the Federal Government, the State of
Michigan, or any Federal or state agency or any other person vested with such power, of a temporary or permanent interest in all or any part of the Airport, the Lessor and the Lessee each shall have
the right to appear and file claims for damages, to the extent of their respective interests, in the condemnation or eminent domain proceedings, to participate in any and all hearings, trials and
appeals therein, and to receive and retain such amount as they may lawfully be entitled to receive as damages or payment as a result of such acquisition. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXV  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> ASSIGNMENT AND SUBLETTING  </B></FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee
shall not at any time assign this Agreement or any part hereof, or sublet any premises now or hereafter leased to Lessee, without the consent in writing of Lessor,
which consent will not be unreasonably withheld; provided, that the foregoing shall not prevent the assignment of this Agreement to any corporation with which Lessee may merge or consolidate, or which
may succeed to the business of Lessee. No such subletting, however, shall release Lessee from its obligations to pay any and all of the rentals, charges, and fees provided or from any other obligation
under this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except
as provided in Article&nbsp;IIIB.2.(b), Lessor shall not at any time assign this Agreement or any part hereof, or pledge, sell, convey, mortgage, encumber,
assign or otherwise transfer the Airport or any portion thereof during the term of this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXVI  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> SUBSIDIARY COMPANIES  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The right to use the premises and facilities leased to Lessee under Article&nbsp;I hereof, or which it may subsequently be entitled to use in accordance with
the exercise of options pursuant to this Agreement, in the manner specified in such Article and any other Articles of this Agreement, shall be extended to all of Lessee's subsidiary companies at no
additional cost. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>28</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=5,SEQ=32,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=701778,FOLIO='28',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DM1224B.;7',USER='AGAETZ',CD='19-MAR-2003;11:18' -->
<!-- THIS IS THE END OF A COMPOSITION COMPONENT -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_do1224_1_29"> </A> </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXVII  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> NOTICES  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notices to Lessor provided for herein shall be sufficient if sent by registered mail, postage prepaid, addressed to Director of Airports, Detroit Metropolitan
Wayne County Airport, Detroit, Michigan 48242; and notices to Lessee, if sent by registered mail, postage prepaid, addressed to Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., 5101 Northwest Drive, St. Paul,
Minnesota 55111, Attention: Vice President-Facilities and Airport Affairs, or to such other respective addresses as the parties may designate to each other in writing from time to time. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXVIII  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> DEFINITIONS  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Activity Fee</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in Article&nbsp;IIIB.1. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Agreement</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean this Airport Use and Lease Agreement. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Airport</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in the first "Whereas" clause of this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Airport Agreement</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean this Agreement, and each other airport use and lease agreement with respect to the Airport
that is substantially the same as this Agreement, except with respect to specific leased premises thereunder. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Airport Development Fund</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the fund of such name created under Ordinance 319. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Airport-system</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the Airport and Willow Run Airport. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Air Transportation</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the business of transporting natural persons, property, cargo and mail by aircraft. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Approved Maximum Landing Weight</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" for any aircraft shall mean the maximum landing weight approved by the FAA for landing
such aircraft at the Airport. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Assigned Operations and Maintenance Functions</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean: (a)&nbsp;operations and maintenance for all of Lessee's
Preferential South Terminal Space, (b)&nbsp;operation and maintenance (including janitorial services, cleaning and minor repairs) of all of the Shared Use South Terminal Space and public space in
the South Terminal and the mechanical equipment therein, (c)&nbsp;the operation and maintenance of all building-wide services, such as heating, cooling, lighting, and electrical services
and (d)&nbsp;the maintenance and repairs of the interior and exterior floors, walls, ceilings and roof of the South Terminal. The foregoing notwithstanding, Assigned Operations and Maintenance
Functions shall not include: (i)&nbsp;operation of the Shared Use South Terminal Space (including gate allocation and utilization), and FIS Facilities in the South Terminal, (ii)&nbsp;the
selection of concessionaires in the South Terminal and operations and maintenance functions to be performed by such concessionaires in the South Terminal, and (iii)&nbsp;police and building security
functions in the South Terminal. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Bonds</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean bonds issued by Lessor pursuant to the Bond Ordinance or any other ordinance of Lessor pursuant to
which airport revenue bonds secured by a pledge of Airport revenue, on a senior or subordinate lien basis, are issued. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;11.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Bond Debt Service</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, all amounts of any nature whatsoever payable during such Fiscal Year
under Ordinance 319 into the Bond Fund (including, but not limited to, the Bond Reserve Account), the Junior Lien Bond Fund, the Operation and Maintenance Reserve Fund and the Renewal and Replacement
Fund, any other payment required by Section&nbsp;604 of Ordinance 319 (including, but not limited to, amounts required to satisfy Lessor's rate covenant) and all amounts of any nature whatsoever
payable during such Fiscal Year under any other ordinance of Lessor pursuant to which Bonds are issued into funds with purposes similar to the aforementioned </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>29</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=33,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=415372,FOLIO='29',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DO1224A.;7',USER='AGAETZ',CD='19-MAR-2003;11:18' -->
<A NAME="page_do1224_1_30"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Ordinance 319 funds, including coverage payments, reduced in all cases by an amount equal to any interest payable on Bonds during such Fiscal Year from Bond proceeds. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;12.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Bond Fund</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the fund of such name as established pursuant to Ordinance 319. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;13.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Bond Ordinance</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Ordinance 319 and such other ordinances enacted and amended from time to time under which
Lessor is authorized to issue Bonds. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;14.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Bond Reserve Account</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the fund of such name as established pursuant to Ordinance 319. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;15.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Cost Centers</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the South Terminal Cost Center and the North Terminal Cost Center, which shall be certain areas
of the Airport grouped together for the purpose of accounting for revenues, O&amp;M Expenses and Bond Debt Service. Each such area is a Cost Center. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;16.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Cost of the North Terminal</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, the Cost of the North Terminal calculated for that Fiscal
Year pursuant to Article&nbsp;IIIA.2(b)(v). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;17.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Cost of the North Terminal County-Controlled Airline Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, the Cost of the North
Terminal County-Controlled Airline Space calculated for that Fiscal Year pursuant to Article&nbsp;IIIF. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;18.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Cost of the North Terminal Airline Premises</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, the Cost of the North Terminal Airline
Premises Area calculated for that Fiscal Year pursuant to Article&nbsp;IIIA.2.(b)(v). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;19.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Cost of the South Terminal</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, the Cost of the South Terminal calculated for that Fiscal
Year pursuant to Article&nbsp;IIIA.2.(b)(iv). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;20.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Cost of the South Terminal County-Controlled Airline Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, the Cost of the South
Terminal County-Controlled Airline Space calculated for that Fiscal Year pursuant to Article&nbsp;IIIF. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;21.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Cost of the South Terminal Airline Premises</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, the Cost of the South Terminal Airline
Premises Area calculated for that Fiscal Year pursuant to Article&nbsp;IIIA.2.(b)(iv). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;22.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>County-Controlled Airline Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean South Terminal County-Controlled Airline Space and North Terminal
County-Controlled Airline Space. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;23.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>County-Controlled Airline Space Revenues</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean revenue received by Lessor for the use of County-Controlled Airline
Space. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;24.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>County Discretionary Fund</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the fund of such name as established pursuant to Ordinance 319. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;25.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Date of Beneficial Occupancy</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with regard to any terminal facility, the date on which an air transportation
company occupies such facility for the operation of its Air Transportation business. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;26.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Excess Costs of the North Terminal Airline Premises</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in Article&nbsp;IIIE.5. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;27.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Excess Costs of the South Terminal Airline Premises</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in Article&nbsp;IIIE.2. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;28.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Excess South Terminal Costs</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in Article&nbsp;IIIE.3. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;29.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Excess North Terminal Costs</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in Article&nbsp;IIIE.7. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>30</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=34,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=699341,FOLIO='30',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DO1224A.;7',USER='AGAETZ',CD='19-MAR-2003;11:18' -->
<A NAME="page_do1224_1_31"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;30.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Exclusive Existing Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Exclusive Use Premises in the Existing Terminal Facilities. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;31.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Exclusive Use Premises</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean space, improvements and facilities at the Airport leased for the exclusive use of an
air carrier. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;32.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Existing Terminal Facilities</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean space, improvements and facilities in the terminals in operation at the Airport
immediately prior to the Date of Beneficial Occupancy of any space in the South Terminal. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;33.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Existing Terminal Space To Be Demolished</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in Article IB.1. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;34.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>FAA</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the Federal Aviation Administration, or any successor agency. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;35.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Facilities Use Fees</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the fees for use of FIS Facilities charged pursuant to Article&nbsp;IIIC. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;36.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Final Audit</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in Article&nbsp;IIIG.5.(b). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;37.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>FIS Facilities</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean that portion of the terminals at the Airport consisting of facilities for the United States
Custom Service, the United States Immigration and Naturalization Service, the United States Department of Health and Human Services and the United States Department of Agriculture, and any successor
departments or services thereto, for the processing of arriving international passengers. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;38.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Fiscal Year</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean October&nbsp;1 of any year through September&nbsp;30 of the following year, or such other
fiscal year as Lessor may adopt for the Airport. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;39.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>June&nbsp;6, 2001 Weighted Majority Request</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit&nbsp;H</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;40.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Junior Lien Bond Fund</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the fund of such name as established pursuant to Ordinance 319. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;41.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Lessee's Existing Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in Article IB.1. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;42.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Lessee's Preferential South Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in Article IB.2.(a). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;43.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Majority-in-Interest of the air carriers</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean either (i)&nbsp;seventy-five
percent (75%) of the Signatory Airlines who together have landed fifty-one percent (51%) of the total landed weight of all
such Signatory Airlines during the immediately preceding calendar year (as such weight is reflected by official Airport records), or (ii)&nbsp;fifty-one percent (51%) of the Signatory
Airlines who have together landed seventy-five percent (75%) of the total landed weight of all such Signatory Airlines during the immediately preceding calendar year (as such weight is
reflected by official Airport records). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;44.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Mid-Year Projection</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in Article&nbsp;IIIG.4. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;45.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>New Bonds</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit&nbsp;H</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;46.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>North Terminal</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the new north terminal facilities at the Airport to be constructed by the County to replace
the Existing Terminal Facilities, provided that prior to the Date of Beneficial Occupancy of the North Terminal, references herein to the North Terminal shall mean the Existing Terminal Facilities, as
such facilities are modified by the Northwest Demolition Project. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;47.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>North Terminal Cost Center</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the Cost Center of the same name described in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit&nbsp;J</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, which includes the land identified as the North Terminal on
</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit&nbsp;J</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, and all
facilities, equipment and improvements now or hereafter located thereon, including all passenger terminal buildings, connecting structures, passenger walkways and tunnels, concourses, hold areas and
federal </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>31</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=35,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=647868,FOLIO='31',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DO1224A.;7',USER='AGAETZ',CD='19-MAR-2003;11:18' -->
<A NAME="page_do1224_1_32"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
inspection service facilities, and any additions and improvements thereto, as that land, facilities, equipment and improvements may change from time to time. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;48.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>North Terminal County-Controlled Airline Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" means certain airline areas in the North Terminal, including but not
limited to, holdrooms, ticket counters, baggage claim areas, outbound baggage rooms, international baggage pick-up, and recheck lobbies, which the County may from time to time retain under
its exclusive control and possession and are not leased to an airline pursuant to an Airport Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;49.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>North Terminal County-Controlled Airline Space Revenues</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, revenues received or
receivable by the County for that Fiscal Year for the use of North Terminal County-Controlled Airline Space. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;50.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>North Terminal Airline Premises</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean collectively, the Preferential North Terminal Space and the Shared Use North
Terminal Space. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;51.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>O&amp;M Expenses</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, direct and indirect expenses of maintenance, operation and administration
of the Airport (including, but not limited to, the South Terminal and the North Terminal) for such Fiscal Year. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;52.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Operation and Maintenance Reserve Fund</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the fund of such name as established pursuant to Ordinance 319. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;53.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Ordinance 319</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean that Amended and Restated Master Airport Revenue Bond Ordinance No.&nbsp;319 adopted by the
County Commission of Lessor on April&nbsp;14, 1998, as such ordinance has been amended or supplemented from time to time. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;54.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Other Available Moneys</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, the amount of money determined by Lessor's Director of Airports
in concurrence with the Chief Financial Officer of Lessor to be transferred by Lessor for such Fiscal Year from PFCs or other sources other than Revenues (as defined in Ordinance 319) to any fund
created under any Bond Ordinance and used to pay principal and interest on Bonds. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;55.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Passenger Credit</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, the credits the Signatory Airlines are entitled to receive for that
Fiscal Year pursuant to Article&nbsp;IIIH. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;56.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Passenger Credit Revenue</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> Amount" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, the sum of (1)&nbsp;the amount of the four
non-airline revenue line items on the County's audited financial statements for the Airport for such Fiscal Year currently entitled "Food and Beverage," "News/Gifts," "Other
Concessions/Duty-free" and "Pay Phone/Telecommunications", or if such titles change, the line items that include the same type of revenue, and (2)&nbsp;the amount, if any, required to be
added to the amount in (i)&nbsp;in order for the Activity Fee rate for such Fiscal Year to not be less than $.35 per thousand pound unit of Approved Maximum Landing Weight. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;57.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Persons</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean natural persons, firms, corporations, partnerships, limited liability companies and other legal
entities. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;58.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>PFCs</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean passenger facility charges imposed by Lessor pursuant to the Aviation and Safety Capacity Expansion Act
of 1990, Pub. L. 101-508, Title IX, Subtitle B, &sect;&sect; 9110 and 911, recodified as 49 U.S.C. 40117, as amended from time to time, and Part&nbsp;158 of the Federal
Aviation Regulations (14 CFR Part&nbsp;158), as amended from time to time. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"Preferential
South Terminal Space" shall mean Preferential Use Premises in the South Terminal. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;59.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Preferential North Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Preferential Use Premises in the North Terminal. </FONT></P>

preferential, non-exclusive manner, e.g., in the manner provided in Article IB.2.(b). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;65.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Renewal and Replacement Fund</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the fund of such name as established pursuant to Ordinance 319. </FONT></P>

SIZE=2><B>Series&nbsp;1998A Bonds</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning set forth in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit&nbsp;H</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;69.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Shared Use Domestic North Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Shared Use North Terminal Space that is used exclusively for
domestic operations. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;70.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Shared Use International North Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Shared Use North Terminal Space that is used exclusively for
international operations. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;71.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Shared Use Swing North Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Shared Use North Terminal Space that is used for both domestic and
international operations. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;72.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Shared Use North Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Shared Use Premises in the North Terminal. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;73.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Shared Use Premises</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean space, improvements and facilities at the Airport to be used jointly or in common by air
carriers, excluding County-Controlled Airline Space and FIS Facilities. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;74.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Shared Use Domestic South Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Shared Use South Terminal Space that is used exclusively for
domestic operations. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;75.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Shared Use International South Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Shared Use South Terminal Space that is used exclusively for
international operations. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;76.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Shared Use Swing South Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Shared Use South Terminal Space that is used for both domestic and
international operations. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;77.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Shared Use South Terminal Space</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Shared Use Premises in the South Terminal. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;78.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Signatory Airlines</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Lessee and those air carriers who have executed an agreement substantially similar to the
First Amended and Restated Airport Agreement. After October&nbsp;1, 2008, in order to be a Signatory Airline, an air carrier shall also have executed an agreement substantially similar to this
Agreement (except for the premises leased thereunder). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;79.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>South Terminal</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the south terminal facilities at the Airport constructed pursuant to the Project Development
Agreement, as such facilities are modified from time to time. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;80.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>South Terminal Airline Premises</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean collectively, the Preferential South Terminal Space and the Shared Use South
Terminal Space. </FONT></P>

Article&nbsp;IIIA and IIIC. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;90.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Terminal Rental Rate</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, the rate established as such pursuant to
Article&nbsp;IIIA.2(b). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;91.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Terminal Use Charges</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the use charges established pursuant to Article&nbsp;IIIA.3. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;92.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Weighted Majority</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean either (a)&nbsp;Signatory Airlines which, in the aggregate, landed
eighty-five percent (85%) or more of the landed weight of all Signatory Airlines for the preceding twelve-month period for which records are available, or (b)&nbsp;all but one of the
Signatory Airlines regardless of landed weight. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;93.&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Year-End Adjustment</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any Fiscal Year, the payments required to be made by the Signatory
Airlines, and/or the credits the Signatory Airlines are entitled to receive, for that Fiscal Year pursuant to Article&nbsp;IIIE. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXIX  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> PARAGRAPH HEADINGS  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The paragraph headings contained herein are for convenience in reference and are not intended to define or limit the scope of any provision of this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>34</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=6,SEQ=38,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=485503,FOLIO='34',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DO1224B.;7',USER='AGAETZ',CD='19-MAR-2003;11:18' -->
<A NAME="page_do1224_1_35"> </A>
<BR>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXX  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> INVALID PROVISION  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event any covenant, condition or provision herein contained is held to be invalid by any court of competent jurisdiction, the invalidity of any such
covenant, condition or provision shall in no way affect any other covenant, condition or provision herein contained; provided that the invalidity of any such covenant, condition or provision does not
materially prejudice either Lessor or Lessee in its respective rights and obligations contained in the valid covenants, conditions or provisions of this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXXI  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS BOUND BY COVENANTS  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All the covenants, stipulations and agreements in this Agreement shall extend to and bind the legal representatives, successors and assigns of the respective
parties hereto. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXXII  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> RIGHT TO LEASE TO UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It is agreed that during time of war or national emergency the Lessor shall have the right to lease the landing area or any part thereof to the United States
Government for military or naval use, and, if any such lease is executed, the provisions of this instrument insofar as they are inconsistent with the provisions of the lease to the Government shall be
suspended. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It
is agreed that this lease shall be subordinate to the provisions of any existing or future agreement between the Lessor and the United States, relative to the operation or maintenance
of the Airport, the execution of which has been or may be required as a condition precedent to the expenditure of Federal funds for the development of the Airport. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXXIII  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> COVENANTS AGAINST DISCRIMINATION  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;COVENANT PURSUANT TO REQUIREMENTS OF THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION:</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee, for itself, its personal
representatives, successors in interest, and assigns, as a part of the consideration hereof, does hereby covenant and agree as a covenant running with the land, that (1)&nbsp;no person on the
grounds of race, color, national origin or gender shall be excluded from participation in, denied the benefits of, or be otherwise subjected to discrimination in the use of facilities at the Airport,
(2)&nbsp;that in the construction of any improvements on, over, or under land at the Airport and the furnishing of services thereon, no person on the grounds of race, color, national origin or
gender shall be excluded from participation in, denied the benefits of, or otherwise be subjected to discrimination, (3)&nbsp;that Lessee shall use the premises in compliance with all other
requirements imposed by or pursuant to Title 49, Code of Federal Regulations, Department of Transportation, Subtitle A, Office of the Secretary, Part&nbsp;21, Nondiscrimination in Federally-assisted
Programs of the Department of Transportation&#151;Effectuation of Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, and as said Regulations may be amended. In the event of a breach of any of the above
non-discrimination covenants, Lessor shall have the right to terminate this agreement and to reenter and repossess said land and the facilities thereon, and hold the same as if said
agreement had never been made or issued. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>35</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=7,SEQ=39,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=786418,FOLIO='35',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DO1224B.;7',USER='AGAETZ',CD='19-MAR-2003;11:18' -->
<BR>
<!-- THIS IS THE END OF A COMPOSITION COMPONENT -->

<P><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_dq1224_1_36"> </A> </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>B.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;EMPLOYMENT:</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The parties hereto hereby covenant not to
discriminate against an employee or applicant for employment with respect to his or her hire, tenure, terms, conditions or privileges of employment, or any matter directly or indirectly related to
employment because of his or her age or sex, except where based on a bona fide occupational qualification, or because of his or her race, color, religion, national origin or ancestry, and to require a
similar covenant on the part of any sublessee hereunder and any subcontractor employed as a result, or in connection with the exercise of rights granted and/or the performance of obligations assumed
under this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>C.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AFFIRMATIVE ACTION PROGRAM:</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition to the foregoing, the
parties hereto agree to carry out and be subject to the provisions of Addendum 1, entitled "NON-DISCRIMINATION AFFIRMATIVE ACTION AND SET ASIDE PROGRAMS FOR WAYNE COUNTY" attached hereto
and made a part hereof. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>D.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;DISADVANTAGED BUSINESS ENTERPRISE:</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee agrees to comply
with the following policy and requirements of the Department of Transportation: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>POLICY.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It is the policy of the Department of Transportation that disadvantaged
business enterprises as defined in 49 CFR Part&nbsp;23 shall have the maximum opportunity to participate in the performance of contracts financed in whole or in part with Federal funds under this
Agreement. Consequently the disadvantaged business enterprise requirements of 49 CFR Part&nbsp;23 apply to this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>DBE OBLIGATION.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;The recipient or its contractor agrees to ensure that
disadvantaged business enterprises as defined in 49 CFR Part&nbsp;23 have the maximum opportunity to participate in the performance of contracts and subcontracts financed in whole or in part with
Federal funds provided under this Agreement. In this regard all recipients or contractors shall take all necessary and reasonable steps in accordance with 49 CFR Part&nbsp;23 to ensure that
disadvantaged business enterprises have the maximum opportunity to compete for and perform contracts. Recipients and their contractors shall not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national
origin, or sex in the award and performance of Department of Transportation-assisted contracts. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Failure
of a contractor or subcontractor to carry out the requirements set forth in paragraph&nbsp;23.43(a) of 49 CFR Part&nbsp;23 shall constitute a breach of contract and, after
notification of the Department of Transportation, may result in termination of the Agreement or contract by the recipient or such remedy as the recipient deems appropriate. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definitions set forth in paragraph&nbsp;23.5 of 49 CFR Part&nbsp;23 shall apply to the foregoing statements concerning disadvantaged business enterprises. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XXXIV  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> CONFORMITY OF AGREEMENT  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that Lessor shall hereafter enter into any lease, contract or agreement with any other scheduled air transport operator, with respect to the use of
the Airport or terminal facilities, containing more favorable terms than this Agreement, or shall hereafter grant to any other scheduled air transport operator, rights or privileges with respect
thereto which are not accorded to Lessee hereunder, then the same rights, privileges and more favorable terms shall be concurrently and automatically made available to Lessee. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>36</FONT></P>

<A NAME="page_dq1224_1_37"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN
WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Agreement to be executed as of the day and year first above written. </FONT></P>

NAME="ds1224_exhibit_a_[map_of_airport]"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ds1224_1"> </A>

NAME="ds1224_exhibit_b_[map_of_lessee_s_existing_terminal_space]"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ds1224_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>EXHIBIT B<BR>  [Map of Lessee's Existing Terminal Space]    <BR></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ds1224_exhibit_c_[maps_of_lessee_s_pr__exh03935"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ds1224_3"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>EXHIBIT C<BR>  [Maps of Lessee's Preferential South Terminal Space and Shared Use South Terminal Space]    <BR></FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=42,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=168482,FOLIO='blank',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DS1224A.;10',USER='JGARCEA',CD='19-MAR-2003;20:26' -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ds1224_exhibit_d_protocol_for_use_of___exh02726"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ds1224_4"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>EXHIBIT D<BR>  <BR>  <BR>  Protocol for Use of International Gates Midfield Terminal    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Exhibit sets fourth utilization procedures for the twelve-(12)&nbsp;international gates at the McNamara Terminal and shall take effect upon commencement of
operations at such gates. These procedures will apply to any future international gates at the McNamara Terminal. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
International gates, together with related hold rooms, passenger loading bridges, ramp access and baggage facilities shall be made available for arrivals or departures based on the
following priorities: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Regularly
scheduled international airline service, with existing service having precedence over new service;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Regularly
scheduled Northwest domestic service;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>International
charter arrivals, if and for so long as the Federal government prohibits FIS operations at the Berry International Terminal;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Irregular
or Diversion international arrivals of scheduled airline;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Delayed
international charter arrivals when the expected delay for the flight to use the Berry International Terminal will exceed 90 minutes and use of the McNamara Terminal FIS gate
will not interfere with the scheduled international or domestic use of that gate.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>6.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Northwest
Airlines domestic irregular and diversion aircraft. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
the event the FAA makes a determination in writing that the foregoing priority of regularly scheduled Northwest domestic service over international charter arrivals if and for so long
as the Federal government prohibits FIS operations at the Berry International Terminal would cause the international gates at the Midfield Terminal to cease to be PFC-eligible or would be
a non-competitive procedure, Lessor and Lessee shall negotiate in good faith a resolution permitting international charter arrivals to have access to FIS operations on a basis sufficient
to satisfy all applicable governmental requirements, charter arrivals at the Midfield Terminal international gates on a reasonable basis considering the scheduled operations of Lessee. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
following criteria will be used to make the determination that an airline is offering scheduled service: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>The
International operation of the airline generally has passengers connecting at the Airport on-line, inter-line, or via code share,
and the operational need for connecting facilities.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>The
Airline operating the flight is a signatory under the use and lease agreement of the Airport.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>The
Airline holds all necessary government approvals to operate international regularly scheduled service.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>The
Airlines international service is scheduled on a year-round basis or is offered seasonally on an annual basis.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>The
Airline's schedules are published in the Official Airline Guide and displayed in computer reservation systems, and the fares regularly published by the
Airline Tariff Publishing Company.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>The
Airlines provide reservation services and create PNRs (passenger name records) for the flights with its own employees. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;International
operations that meet these criteria overall shall be considered international regularly scheduled flights for purposes of this protocol. However, the failure to meet any
one or more criteria shall not necessarily preclude the operation from being considered an international regularly scheduled flight. The Airport's goal of optimizing overall airport operating
efficiency shall be an important consideration. </FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=43,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=978893,FOLIO='blank',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DS1224A.;10',USER='JGARCEA',CD='19-MAR-2003;20:26' -->
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
County will review with Northwest Airlines and other scheduled international carriers, on an annual (or more frequent) basis, the procedures for scheduling, gate occupancy times,
ramp storage locations and penalties for non-compliance. </FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>Cost Center  </B></FONT></P>

immediate curbside. These expenses include, but are not limited to, the following: </FONT></P>

and fringe benefit cost of County employees directly allocable to North Terminal operation &amp; maintenance

expenses

expenses

and maintenance
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Supplies
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Utilities
(includes HVAC, water sewage, electric, etc.)
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Capital
 items procured from O&amp;M budget </FONT></DD></DL>

<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Supplies

(includes HVAC, water, sewage, electric, etc.)
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Capital
items procured from O&amp;M budget </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>Rest of Airport  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All other O&amp;M Expenses not allocable to either the North or South Terminal Cost Center. These include, but are not limited to, the following: </FONT></P>

</UL>

South Terminal </FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=6,SEQ=47,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=177543,FOLIO='blank',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DS1224A.;10',USER='JGARCEA',CD='19-MAR-2003;20:26' -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><I>Other Available Moneys  </I></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each
Fiscal Year, PFCs that are required to be used during such Fiscal Year as set forth in Exhibit&nbsp;H shall be allocated to the North Terminal Cost Center, the
South Terminal Cost Center and the rest of the Airport as follows: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>Cost Center  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>North Terminal  </I></B></FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Existing
Terminal Projects (100% of Series 1998A Bonds PFC eligible Bond Debt Service)
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>North
Terminal Redevelopment Project (excluding apron and taxiways) (100% of New Bond PFC eligible Bond Debt Service) </FONT></DD></DL>


<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>South Terminal  </I></B></FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Midfield
Terminal Phase I Project (100% of Series 1998A Bonds PFC eligible Bond Debt Service)
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Midfield
Terminal Phase II Project (excluding apron and taxiways, south employee parking lot and Taxiway Q) (100% of New Bond PFC eligible Bond Debt Service) </FONT></DD></DL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>Rest of Airport  </B></FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Services

Terminal Redevelopment Project apron and taxiways (100% of New Bond PFC eligible Bond Debt Service)

Terminal Phase II Project apron and taxiways, and Taxiway Q) (100% of New Bond PFC eligible Bond Debt Service)

grant proceeds received from the FAA for 2002 through 2008 pursuant to Lessor's FAA Letter of Intent as reimbursement for the Runway 4L/22R and related projects
and the South Terminal apron and related projects shall be allocated to the rest of the Airport. </FONT></P>

<!-- ZEQ.=10,SEQ=51,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=768398,FOLIO='blank',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DS1224A.;10',USER='JGARCEA',CD='19-MAR-2003;20:26' -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>EXHIBIT H<BR>
REQUIRED USE OF PFCs  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Capital Projects  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessor must use PFCs to pay the maximum amount (except as set forth below) of PFC-eligible Bond Debt Service on (i)&nbsp;the Bonds designated as
Series&nbsp;1998A (the "Series&nbsp;1998A Bonds") and issued to pay the costs of the capital projects listed below under the heading "Series&nbsp;1998A Bonds", and (ii)&nbsp;Bonds to be issued
to pay the costs of the capital projects listed below under the heading "New Bonds" (the "New Bonds"), in each case as described in the Weighted Majority approvals of each of the below listed capital
projects as such Weighted Majority approvals are in effect on the date of this Agreement; provided that the requirement to use PFCs to pay the maximum amount of PFC-eligible Bond Debt
Service on the New Bonds shall only apply to those New Bonds issued to pay the costs for such capital projects set forth in Lessor's June&nbsp;6, 2001 request for Weighted Majority approval of such
projects (the "June&nbsp;6, 2001 Weighted Majority Request"): </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>Series&nbsp;1998A Bonds</I></FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Midfield
Terminal Project&#151;Phase I
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Existing
Terminal Projects
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Other
CIP Projects (but not more than 77% of total Bond Debt Service attributable to these projects) </FONT></DD></DL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>New Bonds(1)</I></FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" WIDTH="120">
<DL compact>
<DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(1)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>The
County will use PFCs on a pay-as-you go basis to pay the PFC-eligible coverage requirements on the New Bonds to be issued to pay the costs of projects B.1, B.2, B.3, B.4, B.5, B.6
and B.11.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Midfield
Terminal Project&#151;Phase II (excluding the South Employee Parking Lot)
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>North
Terminal Redevelopment Project
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Noise
Mitigation Program
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Vehicles/Equipment
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>West
Airfield Improvements (provided that PFCs shall be used to pay PFC-eligible Bond Debt Service on New Bonds issued to pay the costs of the Runway 4/22 Construction
project element of the West Airfield improvements only to the extent that the amount of PFCs used for such purpose in any Fiscal Year, when added to the amount of PFCs used in such Fiscal Year to pay
PFC-eligible Bond Debt Service on Series&nbsp;1998A Bonds issued to pay the costs of projects A.1 and A.2 above, does not exceed $40&nbsp;million)
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>6.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Runway
3L-21R Shoulders/Overburden Project
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>7.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Center
Runway Rehabilitation Project
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>8.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Runway
Surface Monitor System Project
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>9.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Surface
Movement Guidance System Lighting Project
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>10.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Hold
Pad East of 4L
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>11.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Third
Fire Station (ARFF) </FONT></DD></DL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Priority Use of Available PFCs  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If in any Fiscal Year available PFCs are insufficient to pay as set forth above PFC-eligible Bond Debt Service for such Fiscal Year on the
Series&nbsp;1998A Bonds and the New Bonds issued to pay the </FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=11,SEQ=52,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="2",CHK=612373,FOLIO='blank',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]DS1224A.;10',USER='JGARCEA',CD='19-MAR-2003;20:26' -->
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
costs of the projects listed above, such available PFCs will be used to pay PFC-eligible Bond Debt Service in the following order of priority: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;First,
to pay PFC-eligible Bond Debt Service on the Series&nbsp;1998A Bonds issued to pay the costs of projects A.1 and A.2 above, allocated between such
projects on a pro rata basis in accordance with the amount of total Bond Debt Service attributable to such projects; provided that the amount of available PFCs used for this purpose in any Fiscal Year
shall not exceed the lesser of (a)&nbsp;the PFC revenues received by Lessor in such Fiscal Year that are attributable to a PFC of $3, and (b)&nbsp;$45,996,580; </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Second,
to pay a maximum of 77% of total Bond Debt Service on the Series&nbsp;1998A Bonds issued to pay the costs of the projects in A.3 above; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Third,
to pay PFC-eligible Bond Debt Service on New Bonds issued to pay the costs of the terminal portions of projects B.1 and B.2 above (i.e., excluding the
Taxiway Q and apron and other taxiway portions of such projects), allocated between such projects on a pro rata basis in accordance with the amount of PFC-eligible Bond Debt Service
attributable to such terminal portions of such projects; and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Fourth,
to pay PFC-eligible Bond Debt Service on New Bonds issued to pay the costs of the airfield related portions of projects B.1 through B.6 above (i.e.,
projects B.3 through B.6, and the Taxiway Q and apron and other taxiway portions of projects B.1 and B.2), and New Bonds issued to pay the costs of projects B.7 through B.11 above, allocated between
(a)&nbsp;such airfield related portions of projects B.1 through B.6 above on the one hand and (b)&nbsp;projects B.7 through B.11 on the other hand on a pro rata basis in accordance with the amount
of total Bond Debt Service attributable to (i)&nbsp;the airfield related portions of projects B.1 through B.6 above on the one hand and (ii)&nbsp;projects B.7 through B.11 above on the other hand. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;PFC-eligible
Bond Debt Service in any Fiscal Year on any Bonds issued after January&nbsp;18, 2001 to pay the cost of additional capital projects not identified above may
not be paid with PFCs unless (and solely to the extent that) there are remaining available PFCs in such Fiscal Year after available PFCs have been applied in such Fiscal Year to pay all
PFC-eligible Bond Debt Service on the Series&nbsp;1998A Bonds (except for the Series&nbsp;1998A Bonds issued to pay for the projects in A.3 above, in which case the percentage of
PFC-eligible Debt Service to be paid with PFCs is 77%) and on New Bonds issued to pay the capital project costs set forth in the June&nbsp;6, 2001 Weighted Majority Request (including
New Bonds
issued to pay the costs of the Runway 4/22 Construction project portion of project B.5 above to the extent set forth in B.5 above). </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject
to the priority use of available PFCs as set forth above, Lessor shall use legally available PFCs to pay all interest due prior to October&nbsp;1, 2008, on New Bonds issued to
pay the costs of projects B.1 through B.2 above (including interest on New Bonds issued to pay both PFC-eligible and ineligible portions of such projects). </FONT></P>

<TYPE>EX-10.14

<DESCRIPTION>EX 10.14
<TEXT>

<HEAD>

<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#03STP1223_3">QuickLinks</A></FONT>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 10.14  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[Confidential
Information Omitted] </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ea1224_amendment_no._1_to_the_a330_pu__ame03961"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ea1224_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Amendment No.&nbsp;1<BR>  To the A330 Purchase Agreement<BR>  Dated as of December&nbsp;21, 2000    <BR>    <BR>    Between    <BR>    <BR>    AVSA, S.A.R.L.    <BR>    <BR>    And    <BR>    <BR>    NORTHWEST AIRLINES,
&nbsp;INC.    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment No.&nbsp;1 (hereinafter referred to as the "Amendment") is entered into as of November&nbsp;26, 2001, between AVSA, S.A.R.L., a
soci&eacute;t&eacute; &agrave; responsabilit&eacute; limit&eacute;e organized and existing under the laws of the Republic of France, having its registered
office located at 2, Rond-Point Maurice Bellonte, 31700 Blagnac, France (hereinafter referred to as the "Seller"), and NORTHWEST AIRLINES,&nbsp;INC., a corporation organized and existing
under the laws of the State of Minnesota, United States of America, having its principal corporate offices located at 2700 Lone Oak Parkway, Eagan, Minnesota 55121, USA (hereinafter referred to as the
"Buyer"). </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>WITNESSETH
</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the Buyer and the Seller entered into an A330 Purchase Agreement, dated as of December&nbsp;21, 2000, relating to the sale by the Seller and the purchase by the Buyer of
certain Airbus Industrie A330-300 aircraft (the "Aircraft") which, together with all Exhibits, Appendices and Letter Agreements attached thereto is hereinafter called the "Agreement." </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
pursuant to the terms of Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;8 to the Agreement, the Seller and the Buyer have agreed to set out certain provisions relating to Predelivery Payments
which the parties now wish to amend by this Amendment No.1. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Agreement. The terms "herein," "hereof" and "hereunder" and words
of similar import refer to this Amendment. Both parties agree that this Amendment shall constitute an integral, nonseverable part of the Agreement and be governed by its provisions, except that if the
Agreement and this Amendment have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific provisions contained in this Amendment shall govern. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW,
THEREFORE, IT IS AGREED AS FOLLOWS: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>AMENDMENT TO LETTER AGREEMENT NO. 8</I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Sub-paragraph&nbsp;2.1.3
of Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;8 is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced by the following quoted provisions: </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;QUOTE </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;CONFIDENTIAL
MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;UNQUOTE
</FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>1</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2105681",CP="NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION",DN="3",CHK=1040538,FOLIO='1',FILE='DISK027:[03STP4.03STP1224]EA1224A.;12',USER='JGARCEA',CD='19-MAR-2003;19:57' -->
<A NAME="page_ea1224_1_2"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>2.
CONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;CONFIDENTIAL
MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>EFFECT OF THE AMENDMENT</I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Agreement will be deemed amended to the extent herein provided, and, except as specifically amended hereby, will continue in full force and effect in accordance with its original
terms. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>CONFIDENTIALITY</I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
Amendment is subject to the confidentiality provisions set forth in Subclause 22.4 of the Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
the foregoing correctly sets forth our understanding, please indicate your acceptance by signing in the space provide below. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>Very
truly yours,<BR>
AVSA, S.A.R.L. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>By:
/s/ Francois Besnier </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>Its:
AVSA Chief Executive Officer </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 10.15  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[Confidential
Information Omitted] </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ee1224_amendment_no._2_to_the_a330_pu__ame03962"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ee1224_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Amendment No.&nbsp;2<BR>  To the A330 Purchase Agreement<BR>  Dated as of December&nbsp;21, 2000    <BR>    <BR>    Between    <BR>    <BR>    AVSA, S.A.R.L.    <BR>    <BR>    And    <BR>    <BR>    NORTHWEST AIRLINES,
&nbsp;INC.    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment No.&nbsp;2 (hereinafter referred to as this "Amendment") is entered into as of December&nbsp;20, 2002, between AVSA, S.A.R.L., a
soci&eacute;t&eacute; &agrave; responsabilit&eacute; limit&eacute;e organized and existing under the laws of the Republic of France, having its registered
office located at 2, Rond-Point Maurice Bellonte, 31700 Blagnac, France (hereinafter referred to as "AVSA"), and NORTHWEST AIRLINES,&nbsp;INC., a corporation organized and existing under
the laws of the State of Minnesota, United States of America, having its principal corporate offices located at 2700 Lone Oak Parkway, Eagan, Minnesota 55121, USA (hereinafter referred to as
"Northwest"). </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>WITNESSETH  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, Northwest and AVSA entered into an A330 Purchase Agreement, dated as of December&nbsp;21, 2000, relating to the sale by AVSA and the purchase by
Northwest of certain Airbus Industrie A330-300 aircraft (the "Aircraft") which, together with all Exhibits, Appendices and Letter Agreements attached thereto and as amended by Amendment
No.&nbsp;1 thereto dated as of November&nbsp;26, 2001, is hereinafter called the "Agreement." </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
AVSA and Northwest have agreed to certain changes in the Aircraft delivery schedule and in other terms of the Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Agreement. The terms "herein," "hereof" and "hereunder" and words
of similar import refer to this Amendment. Both parties agree that this Amendment shall constitute an integral, nonseverable part of the Agreement and be governed by its provisions, except that if the
Agreement and this Amendment have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific provisions contained in this Amendment shall govern. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW,
THEREFORE, IT IS AGREED AS FOLLOWS: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RESCHEDULING</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>1.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Northwest
and AVSA have agreed to reschedule one Firm Aircraft as follows: </FONT></P>

</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Option Aircraft will be scheduled for delivery at the rate of one (1)&nbsp;per quarter starting in the third calendar quarter of CONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY
WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT. and ending in the second calendar quarter ofCONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE
SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT.. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>UNQUOTE
</FONT></P>

and AVSA have agreed to reschedule and convert Firm Aircraft into Converted Firm A330-200 Aircraft as follows: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT><FONT

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As
a consequence of Subparagraph 1.1 and Paragraphs 2 and 3 above, the delivery schedule in Subclause 9.1 of the Agreement is hereby canceled and replaced by the following quoted
delivery schedule for Firm Aircraft and Converted Firm A330-200 Aircraft: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>UNQUOTE </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;PURCHASE RIGHT AIRCRAFT</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subparagraph
3.2 of Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;2 of the Agreement is canceled and replaced with the following quoted text: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>QUOTE
</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>3.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Applicable Terms</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;On
Purchase Right Aircraft Exercise, (i)&nbsp;the price terms that apply to Option Aircraft will be extended to the applicable Purchase Right Aircraft, so long as such Purchase Right
Aircraft is scheduled for delivery to Northwest before the end ofCONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL OMITTED AND </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>7</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>UNQUOTE </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>6.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;FLEXIBILITY</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>6.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Conversion Rights</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>6.1.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Conversion Rights to A330-300</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AVSA
grants Northwest the right to convert into a firmly ordered A330-300 model Aircraft each Converted Firm A330-200 Aircraft, Option Aircraft and Purchase Right
Aircraft identified below (a "Converted Firm A330-300 Aircraft"): </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(i)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>each
Converted Firm A330-200 Aircraft,
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(ii)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>each
Option Aircraft that has been converted to a Converted Firm A330-200 Aircraft pursuant to Paragraph&nbsp;4.1 of Letter Agreement
No.&nbsp;2 of the Agreement (as amended below in this Amendment), and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(iii)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>each
Purchase Right Aircraft that has been converted into a Converted Firm A330-200 Aircraft pursuant to Paragraph&nbsp;4.1 of Letter
Agreement No.&nbsp;2 of the Agreement (as amended below in this Amendment). </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Northwest
may exercise this right by giving written notice to AVSA no later than CONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT
TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT.months prior to the first day of the month in which the Aircraft to be converted is scheduled for delivery (the "A330-300 Conversion Right"). The
delivery position for a Converted Firm A330-300 Aircraft will be CONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR
CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT. </FONT></P>

grants Northwest the right to convert Firm Aircraft into firmly ordered A330-200 aircraft (the "Converted Firm A330-200 Aircraft") as follows: </FONT></P>

A330 Conversion Right, A340 Conversion Right, CONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL
TREATMENT.be referred to individually and collectively as a "Flexibility Right." No Aircraft or Converted Firm A330-200 Aircraft may be the object of more than one Flexibility Right,
CONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT.except that an Aircraft or Converted Firm
A330-200
Aircraft which has benefited from the exercise of a CONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT.may
also be the object of a subsequent A330 Conversion Right or A340 Conversion Right, and an Aircraft or Converted Firm A330-200 Aircraft that has benefited from the exercise of an A330
Conversion Right or A340 Conversion Right may also be the subject of a CONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR
CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT.subject to the terms of the A330 Conversion Right, or A340 Conversion Right, unless agreed otherwise between Northwest and AVSA. </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(1)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>CONFIDENTIAL
MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(2)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>CONFIDENTIAL
MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(3)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>CONFIDENTIAL
MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT. </FONT></DD></DL>
<BR>
</UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(iii)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>CONFIDENTIAL
MATERIAL OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<DL compact>
